channel.title: Add dependencies on ShardingSphere
channel.description: Recent content in Add dependencies on ShardingSphere

item.title: Add Bitronix dependencies
item.description: Add Bitronix dependencies Adding Bitronix dependencies requires downloading the following jar files and adding them under ext-lib path. jar file downloads btm-2.1.3.jar shardingsphere-transaction-xa-bitronix.jar Please download the corresponding shardingsphere-transaction-xa-bitronix.jar file according to the proxy version.

item.title: Add Narayana dependencies
item.description: Add Narayana dependencies Adding Narayana dependencies requires downloading the following jar files and adding them under ext-lib path. jar file downloads arjuna-5.12.4.Final.jar common-5.12.4.Final.jar javax.activation-api-1.2.0.jar jaxb-api-2.3.0.jar jaxb-core-2.3.0.jar jaxb-impl-2.3.0.jar jboss-connector-api_1.7_spec-1.0.0.Final.jar jboss-logging-3.2.1.Final.jar jboss-transaction-api_1.2_spec-1.0.0.Alpha3.jar jboss-transaction-spi-7.6.0.Final.jar jta-5.12.4.Final.jar narayana-jts-integration-5.12.4.Final.jar shardingsphere-transaction-xa-narayana.jar Please download the corresponding shardingsphere-transaction-xa-narayana.jar file according to the proxy version.
